#summary Android on BeagleBoard information page

= Introduction =

This page collects hardware-related notes about Android on !BeagleBoard. It also contains information regarding features, limitations and other board-specific topics relevant to Android

We strongly recommend to get familiar with !BeagleBoard resources at *[http://beagleboard.org beagleboard.org]*

=== Board Revisions Tested ===
We are verifying regular builds on *C3* revision. It also expected work on *B7* and *C2*

=== Bootloader information ===
We are using uboot 2009.10 version (see pre-built stuff here: )
You can build uboot manually from [http://gitorious.org/u-boot-omap3]
